languages.text: {n}Луна, обратившаяся в волка, задирает голову и протяжно воет. Затем она переводит мудрый, пронзительный взгляд на вас, и кровь с белоснежных клыков проливается дождем на застывший мир.{/n}
{n}The wolf-moon raises its head and howls. Then it turns its wise, piercing gaze on you, and blood rains down from its snow-white fangs onto the frozen world.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Луна, обратившаяся в волка, задирает голову и протяжно воет. Затем она переводит мудрый, пронзительный взгляд на вас, и кровь с белоснежных клыков проливается дождем на застывший мир.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The wolf-moon raises its head and howls. Then it turns its wise, piercing gaze on you, and blood rains down from its snow-white fangs onto the frozen world.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The wolf-moon raises its head and howls. Then it turns its wise, piercing gaze on you, and blood rains down from its snow-white fangs onto the frozen world.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}月下的野狼抬起头，发出了一声嚎叫。随后，他将睿智而刺骨的目光投向你。鲜血从雪白的獠牙中倾泻而下，洒向冰封的世界。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wolf-moon raises its head and howls. Then it turns its wise, piercing gaze on you, and blood rains down from its snow-white fangs onto the frozen world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}月下的野狼抬起头，发出了一声嚎叫。随后，他将睿智而刺骨的目光投向你。鲜血从雪白的獠牙中倾泻而下，洒向冰封的世界。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}狼の月が顔を上げ、遠吠えする。それから思考を取り戻し、あなたを刺すような視線でじっと見る。そして雪のように白い牙から凍った星へと血の雨が降り注ぐ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wolf-moon raises its head and howls. Then it turns its wise, piercing gaze on you, and blood rains down from its snow-white fangs onto the frozen world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}狼の月が顔を上げ、遠吠えする。それから思考を取り戻し、あなたを刺すような視線でじっと見る。そして雪のように白い牙から凍った星へと血の雨が降り注ぐ。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}La luna loba levanta la cabeza y aúlla. Después, dirige su sabia y penetrante mirada hacia ti y la sangre cae de sus colmillos, blancos como la nieve, sobre el mundo helado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wolf-moon raises its head and howls. Then it turns its wise, piercing gaze on you, and blood rains down from its snow-white fangs onto the frozen world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La luna loba levanta la cabeza y aúlla. Después, dirige su sabia y penetrante mirada hacia ti y la sangre cae de sus colmillos, blancos como la nieve, sobre el mundo helado.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le loup de la lune lève la tête au ciel et pousse un hurlement, puis il tourne son regard sage et perçant vers vous tandis qu'une pluie de sang coule de ses crocs blancs comme la neige pour s'abattre sur le monde gelé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wolf-moon raises its head and howls. Then it turns its wise, piercing gaze on you, and blood rains down from its snow-white fangs onto the frozen world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le loup de la lune lève la tête au ciel et pousse un hurlement, puis il tourne son regard sage et perçant vers vous tandis qu'une pluie de sang coule de ses crocs blancs comme la neige pour s'abattre sur le monde gelé.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Wolfmond hebt seinen Kopf und heult. Dann trifft sein kluger, durchbohrender Blick dich, und von seinen schneeweißen Fangzähnen regnet es Blut auf die eisige Welt herab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wolf-moon raises its head and howls. Then it turns its wise, piercing gaze on you, and blood rains down from its snow-white fangs onto the frozen world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Wolfmond hebt seinen Kopf und heult. Dann trifft sein kluger, durchbohrender Blick dich, und von seinen schneeweißen Fangzähnen regnet es Blut auf die eisige Welt herab.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ay kurdu, başını kaldırıp uluyor. Ardından bilge ve delici bakışlarını sana çeviriyor. Kar beyazı dişlerinden donuk dünyaya kan yağıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The wolf-moon raises its head and howls. Then it turns its wise, piercing gaze on you, and blood rains down from its snow-white fangs onto the frozen world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ay kurdu, başını kaldırıp uluyor. Sonra bilge ve delici bakışlarını sana çeviriyor. Kar beyazı dişlerinden donuk dünyaya kan yağıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
